channel.title: JOption?
channel.description: I know the basic JOptionPane.showMessageDialog and JOptionPane.showInputDialog but for the input dialog or the message dialog how do i make it so instead of just being able to clikc okay, you can click either yes or no?

@pistolbob wrote:

I know the basic JOptionPane.showMessageDialog and JOptionPane.showInputDialog but for the input dialog or the message dialog how do i make it so instead of just being able to clikc okay, you can click either yes or no?
